subject: Soccer
Stadiums and Arenas
Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
Prisons and Prisoners
Copa America (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The stadium, which was used as a prison camp after the 1973 military coup that overthrew Chile’s Marxist president, is the site of six games in the Copa América soccer tournament.
snippet: The stadium, which was used as a prison camp after the 1973 military coup that overthrew Chile’s Marxist president, is the site of six games in the Copa América soccer tournament.
